summary: After a generation of peace, the Earth Federation's new space colonies becomes a battlefield. To save his friends and family, the reluctant warrior Seabook Arno becomes the pilot of a new Gundam which bears the code name F91.
cast: Kôji Tsujitani|Yumi Tôma|Masaaki Maeda|Kiyoyuki Yanada|Takeshi Kusao|Yuri Amano|Eriko Chihara|Mari Devon|Dorothy Elias-Fahn|Akifumi Endô|Michael Forest|Sandy Fox|Barbara Goodson|Hiroshi Hashimoto|Masato Hirano|Teiyû Ichiryûsai|Masaru Ikeda|Sayuri Ikemoto|Kazue Ikura|Minoru Inaba|Takurô Kitagawa|Kiyoshi Kobayashi|Yûko Kobayashi|Takehito Koyasu|Steve Kramer|Chie Kôjiro|Lex Lang|Wendee Lee|Julie Maddalena|Dave Mallow|Mona Marshall|Taiki Matsuno|Atsuko Mine|Tomohiro Nishimura|Colleen O'Shaughnessey|Joe Ochman|Tony Oliver|Ai Orikasa|Bob Papenbrook|Tony Pope|Simon Prescott|Jamieson Price|Derek Stephen Prince|Michelle Ruff|Philece Sampler|Lia Sargent|Hiroyuki Satô|Joshua Seth|Yoku Shioya|Miyoko Shôji|Melodee Spevack|Paul St. Peter|Steve Staley|Doug Stone|Kim Strauss|Takashi Taguchi|Teppei Takasugi|Yasuhiro Takato|Hiroshi Takemura|Julie Ann Taylor|Mikio Terashima|Kirk Thornton|Akiko Tsuboi|Noriko Uemura|Shigeru Ushiyama|Kari Wahlgren|Norio Wakamoto|Takeshi Watabe|Dave Wittenberg|Tom Wyner|Mari Yokô|Konami Yoshida|Tamio Ôki|Ryûzaburô Ôtomo
title: Kidô senshi Gundam F91
